content: just for transparency i have yet to have this pattern tech edited it will be done and remain free once my etsy shop is reopen and i can comfortably pay my tech editor during these uncertain times i will of course be on hand as always for pattern support i love knitting washcloths or dishcloths facecloths however you use them they re so quick and make great gifts there are plenty of free patterns available so i thought why not add a few more to the mix these patterns are available on my website/blog and have a downloadable option too there will be 4 patterns in total with the 2nd in the collection coming later this week with each using around 10g of dk cotton and using a mixture of knit and purl stitches perfect for beginners and with an optional crochet loop to hang your cloths dry between uses and after machine washing each cloth is easily adjustable i tend to like them on the small side but just cast on more stitches as long as your cast on number is divisible by 4 you should be good to go you will need 3mm needles 3mm crochet hook a darning needle gauge is not essential however depending on your gauge it will affect how much yardage you use i would love to see your washcloths so please don t forget to tag me on instagram @ littlewonderfibreco and use the hashtag # littlewonderfibreco it s so fun seeing your versions of my patterns
